description:
Internal alterations, upgrade of all services and complete renovation of the whole apartment.  The internal alterations will mainly comprising of:
Removal of the non-original wall between the kitchen/breakfast room and the living room; 
Reconfiguration and re-fitting of the 2 bathrooms, and removal of the out of use corner chimney breast to accommodate new guest WC; reconfiguration of bathroom drainpipes to eliminate the internal steps leading into both bathrooms. 
Replacement of all internal doors and architraves, including entrance door, to be in the style of the period. Removal of the non-original arches in the hallway.
Reinstatement of period details - cornices, skirtings, and architraves, with overhaul of all existing windows
